title: Thanks for the skin gift Riot! but I'm confused?
body:
Hello! I just logged on to my game and discovered that I had been gifted the "battle bunny Riven skin" by riot.  thanks!

But  here's where I'm confused, I just received the anniversary riot Kayle skin. I appreciate the gift but I'm wondering if anyone else received one, or if a rioter could shed some light on this. (oh and a side note I don't own Rivin) Thanks for the help! and thanks for the skin! :)

replies.body: Might have just been an honest mistake. since it was manually done to each account there is the possibility that a rioter put the kayle skin on your acc and might have had a memory lasp and just assumed you already had it and gifted you.
if that's the case what luck! I'm still curious tho, if this happened to anyone else?
No clue, you're the first i've seen of this happening to.
